valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Fri 26 Dec 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Sat 27 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Low FitzRoy 1008 losing its identity. New low Trafalgar 1004 and new high Faeroes 1048 by midday tomorrow
